title: Blackout
description: Bound by blood and betrayal, she'll destroy this kingdom. Trembling in the wake of devastating treachery, can the Loxely sisters finally bring down the Royals? United in the cause of saving their kingdom and bringing their family back together, Jessa and Sasha will face their greatest tests yet. Jessa's wedding is coming at her faster than she can stop it, but it's Sasha who is running out of time. Things aren't as they seem in the palace, and the one person who can save them is the one they'll never trust again. Preorder book three in bestselling The Color Alchemist Series today!
author: Nina Walker
